name: Flight Sim Part 3 (Weapons and AI)
description:
A simple flight simulator in Unity3D. Gamepad required.

Blog post: https://vazgriz.com/503/creating-a-flight-simulator-in-unity3d-part-3/

git: https://github.com/vazgriz/FlightSim (at tag part-3)

Controls:

L Stick - Roll/Pitch

R Stick - Camera

Triggers - Yaw

R Bumper - Throttle Up

L Bumper - Throttle Down (Hold for Airbrake)

D-Pad Down - Toggle flaps and landing gear

A - Fire Cannon

B - Launch Missile

Space - Toggle AI on your plane

H - Close help dialog

Tips:

- Speed is in knots

- Takeoff speed is ~130 knots

- Using airbrake with landing gear down will activate wheel brake

- Refresh the page to reset the game
